That Simon won't understand

Don't be out a minute longer.

Everything went wrong.

Apparently, I know nothing!

Rõ là mẹ chẳng biết gì hết!

Now you've made everything even worse!
 -But you refused to talk to me.

You've destroyed my life,

- Hi. -Hey.
 Hey.

-Det är den där jävla reportern igen. -Vadå, om kronprinsen?

What?

What the hell?

They're asking loads of other stuff as well.

Như vụ gì?

They're just trying to find an opening, right?
 - Yeah. -Huh.

-Hi.

Ah.

-Hur mår du? -Nu mår jag bra.

Cậu sao rồi?

I'm fine now.

en: Bra.
